test_scenarios_covered: IME: Enter key does not submit during composition
IME: Enter key does not submit immediately after composition ends
Basic rendering: Textarea and send button render
Basic rendering: Send button disabled when empty
Basic rendering: Send button enabled when has content

implementation_summary.handleKeyDown_changes: Added isMobile condition to allow Enter key to insert newline on mobile devices instead of submitting
implementation_summary.aria_label_added: Added aria-label='Send message' to submit button for accessibility

commits: 85f9cfa: feat(message-input): mobile Enter key inserts newline instead of submit (#20)
message: TDD implementation complete. All 12 MessageInput tests pass. Coverage: 78.66%. Desktop Enter submits, Mobile Enter inserts newline. Send button has aria-label for accessibility.
